text: Leposoma puk is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposoma Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 2002 Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues Category:Taxa named by Marianna Dixo Category:Taxa named by Dante Pavan Category:Taxa named by Vanessa Kruth Verdade
title: Leposoma puk
